name: Serial to pcap
tagline: Convert serial communication traffic to pcapng that could be read by Wireshark
body:
### Welcome to Michael's Pages.
This tool convert serial communication traffic to pcapng that could be read and analyzed by Wireshark.

Wirtten by AutoHotKey scripts.

Currently supported protocol: 

1) DNP3.0

2) IEC 60870-5-101

3) IEC 60870-5-103

4) IEC 60870-5-104

5) Modbus TCP

### Authors and Contributors
This script written by Michael Zhang.

### Support or Contact
Having questions? Please contact michaelxmail[AT]gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
